attributes.action: CLOSE ALL AIRPORTS ETC. DUE TO EBOLA THREAT
attributes.additional_details: At present there are over 4,000 confirmed deaths due to Ebola. The death rate is doubling every month. That means by the beginning of the new year the death toll will have risen to16,000. At that rate, 4000 to the power of 15, the number of deaths worldwide will exceed SIXTY FIVE & A HALF MILLIONS. We need to close ALL points of entry into the UK NOW and become self sufficient until this disease is brought under control.

rejection.details: Similar to existing petition. Please see -  Tighter Border restrictions to prevent Ebola outbreak
